headline: 2025-11-05 — Palo Alto Networks expanded its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity offerings by launching 1 new AI module for enterprise protection (1 module); evidence: Reuters reported PANW is expanding its AI-powered cybersecurity offerings.

2025-11-04 — Microsoft reported that Russian online influence campaigns had been active for 45 days in the run-up to the U.S. presidential election (45 days); evidence: Reuters stated campaigns 'kicked into gear over the past 45 days.'

2025-11-03 — The U.S. Army's 18th Airborne Corps conducted satellite-image analysis as part of command operations, with soldiers from 1 corps actively poring over imagery (1 corps engaged); evidence: Bloomberg described soldiers from the 18th Airborne Corps examining satellite images at Fort Liberty.
